Service Details: - Provides education, advocacy and support services to people with epilepsy - Offers resource center, lecture series and educational events, seizure awareness workshops, support groups, and information for women and girls living with Epilepsy - Funds research, provides hospital outreach, camp opportunities for kids with epilepsy, and post-secondary scholarships
Meetings: Contact our office for information on support groups and events in the Central Okanagan
Address & Map: 900 West 8th Ave, Unit 2500Vancouver, BC     V5Z 1E5View MapQuest Map
Print Material: Available in Chinese, Vietnamese, Punjabi, Korean and French
